comment._content: Giovanni Martinelli (22 October 1885 – 2 February 1969), Italian operatic tenor (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Martinelli) He was married to Adele Previtali (d. January 16, 1980) from August 7, 1913 until his death. The child must be his their daughter Bettina, born 1915. See also comments under
